channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-22522] BytesHashMap has many verbose logs
item.description:
I ran a query which contains operators using BytesHashMap, and the logs file contain many following logs

2021-04-29 14:00:47,420 INFO  org.apache.flink.table.runtime.util.collections.binary.BytesMap [] - reset BytesHashMap with record memory segments 758, 24838144 in bytes, init allocating 32 for bucket area.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
